# Using source-highlight convert python code to html # this will be better when we can use this to # create a new document.
lang=`echo "$TM_MODE" |tr "[:upper:]" "[:lower:]"` case "$lang" in
c++) lang="cpp" ;; html\ \(php\)) lang="php3" ;; ruby\ on\ rails) lang="ruby" ;; ocaml) lang="caml" ;; esac expand -3 | "$TM_SUPPORT_PATH"/source-highlight --line-number --src-lang=$lang --out-format=xhtml
